com.uofa.adventure_app.activity

Class EditFragementActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.uofa.adventure_app.interfaces.AdventureActivity
        • com.uofa.adventure_app.activity.EditFragementActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataReturn<Story>

    public class EditFragementActivity
extends AdventureActivity
    This class deals with users editing fragements. It interacts with the majority of the model and allows the user to access the camera and the existing photo library in order to allow the user to add images to fragements.
    Author:
    Kevin Lafond, Joel Malina
